short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear chrome browser history on startup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deletes browser history prior to the specified number of days when the window is closed, leaving only the number of days specified.
Only the most recent history for the specified number of days will remain.
It is manifest v3 compliant, so it can be used for a long time.

This extension does not possess or collect any personal data, including analytics.
The implementation is very simple, so please check it out if you are interested.
